Event Description: This is an event consists of three rounds. By participating in this event participants will improve their speaking skill, coding skill and general technical knowledge related to today’s it/cp on-going things.
Round 1:Buzz-Up
This is a buzzer round event in which they have to identify IT/CP based companies,persons,etc. There will be total 20 questions which include 10 logo, 5 tag line, 5 picture to identify (ceo, place, etc).Number of participants will be divided into small groups and they have to answer as quickly as possible by pressing buzzer. Correct answer will get 2 marks and wrong answer has 1 mark decrement. All the questions are shown on projector to participants.
Round 2: Speak the Pic
All the participants will be paired up according to their performance in 1st round. They will be shown two pictures (one technical and the other one non-technical). They have to relate both the pictures and speak on it. They also have to give their introduction in it. Here they will be judged on their speaking skills.
Round 3: Crash IT
In this round selected participants will be given a question(long story) and they have to make a program based on that questions(situations). Coding will be done on C++.
